name: Kanto's Breakout
description:
This brick breaker clone was an attempt to learn and execute some basics of the ball-and-paddle genre. It does contain some glitches as it is not as polished as it can be. Also headphone warning as the TNT blocks are loud for some reason.

This version includes:

  • 20 Levels to overcome
  • A mix of 15 different power ups/downs

Controls are:
-(Mouse): Navigate Menus
-[WASD]/[Arrow Keys]: Movement
-[Space]: Shoot ball

Some known glitches:
-Balls can get trapped between the paddle and wall if it does not have enough room to move away.
-The magnet power up can sometimes cause the balls to attach to the bottom of the paddle (typically if hitting the bottom part of the paddle), or freeze in mid air (typically when multiple balls are present).
-The paddle can become embedded into the wall if the grow paddle power up is grabbed near the wall.
